description.en:
### Manman Girls

1. About the Reaction of the Girl Who Saw "The Slut Monthly" / Gekkan "The Bitch" o Mita Onna no Hannou ni Tsuite (月刊「ザ・ビッチ」を見た女の反応について。)
2. Humanity Needs Health and Physical Education / Jinrui ni wa Hokentaiiku ga Hitsuyou desu. (人類には保健体育が必要です。)
3. Ninnin Panic! (ニンニンパニック！)
4. Smell Love Love Love Smell (スメルラブラブラブスメル)
5. Roleplaying Magical Girl Bokos / Narikiri Mahou Shoujo Bokos (なりきり魔法少女ボコス)
6. I Want to See It. / Mitain desu. (見たいんです。)
7. Ihara-chan Is Big-Bellied / Ihara-chan wa Futoppara (井原ちゃんは太っ腹)
8. She's a Carnivore / Kanojo wa Nikushoku-kei (彼女は肉食系)
